snippet: To accommodate the new attraction, Walt Disney World is taking out Maelstrom, a 1980s-era flume ride that still has fans.
abstract: Walt Disney World is removing 1980-era flume ride Maelstrom from its Norway pavilion at Epcot Center in Orlando, to build a new attraction based on hit movie Frozen.
lead_paragraph: To accommodate the new attraction, Walt Disney World is taking out Maelstrom, a 1980s-era flume ride that still has fans.

headline.main: ‘Frozen’ Finds a Theme Park Home at Epcot
headline.print_headline: ‘Frozen’ Finds a Theme Park Home at Disney’s Epcot

keywords.value: Disney, Walt, World (Lake Buena Vista, Fla)
